p: Both azole-resistant and azole-susceptible A. fumigatus colonies were recovered from all 114 samples. For both indicator azoles TEB and ITR, the fraction of resistant isolates fluctuated throughout the sampling period at around 50% ( Fig. 2 and 4). Full results are shown in Table S1. There were no significant differences in fraction resistant over time or between sampling sites (chi-square test; P > 0.05).
